discoveredAssets: localhost:8080 - Markdown to HTML Converter (Werkzeug 3.1.3 / Python 3.13.3) - Port 8080
localhost:8080/convert - POST endpoint - Main conversion functionality
localhost:8080/admin/flag - Flag endpoint with sensitive information disclosure

targets.objective: Test for markdown injection, XXE vulnerabilities, SSTI (Server-Side Template Injection), XSS via markdown processing, SSRF via URL parameter, code injection, and business logic flaws in markdown-to-HTML conversion
targets.rationale: Primary attack surface accepting user input via POST. Accepts both direct markdown text and URL parameters. Markdown processing library may have parsing vulnerabilities. URL parameter could enable SSRF attacks if content is fetched without proper validation.

targets.objective: Test for authentication bypass, authorization flaws, exposed sensitive endpoints without access controls, and information disclosure
targets.rationale: Unauthenticated admin interface accessible from internet without any security controls. Contains link to sensitive flag endpoint. Should require authentication but does not. Represents direct authorization vulnerability.

targets.objective: Test for authentication bypass, authorization enforcement, sensitive data exposure, and verify access controls on sensitive endpoints
targets.rationale: Critical information disclosure endpoint exposing flag directly. No authentication or authorization required. Should be restricted to authenticated admin users only. Represents direct security control bypass.

targets.objective: Test for reflected/stored XSS in form fields, CSRF protection, input validation bypass, and identification of attack vectors through form processing
targets.rationale: Entry point for user interaction. Form accepts markdown and URL inputs. Potential for form-based attacks and vulnerabilities in input handling and processing logic.

keyFindings: [CRITICAL] Unauthenticated access to flag endpoint - http://localhost:8080/admin/flag exposes sensitive information without any authentication or authorization
[HIGH] Admin interface accessible without authentication - http://localhost:8080/admin accessible from internet without login requirement
[HIGH] User input processing in /convert endpoint - Accepts markdown_text and url parameters for processing, potential for injection attacks, SSRF, and XXE vulnerabilities
[MEDIUM] No API documentation found - No Swagger, OpenAPI, or GraphQL endpoints discovered. Application appears to be form-only interface
[MEDIUM] Python/Werkzeug framework detected - Python 3.13.3 with Werkzeug 3.1.3. Check for known framework vulnerabilities
[LOW] Static directory listing disabled - Proper security practice implemented for /static/ directory
